text.section: A custodian, as defined in § 10-611 of the State Government Article, may allow access to information about prospective, qualified, and sworn jurors only in accordance with rules that the Court of Appeals adopts.
The rules shall provide for access to, and copying of, information needed for a challenge under § 8-408 or § 8-409 of this title.
The rules shall provide for disclosure of information to the State Board of Elections as to individuals who have died, have moved, or are not citizens of the United States.
The rules shall provide for disclosure of information to the State Motor Vehicle Administration as needed to correct data that the Administration provides.
